issue.title: [CF 723] Rune icon type custom textures
issue.body:
From Lov3star:

Another very small thing:

You can set a custom texture for the Death Knight Rune icon type. However, if you do this, the icon will not change to indicate a Death Rune is active.

My suggestion is to have 2 Custom Texture inputs for the Rune icon type: "Normal" and "Death Rune" textures. If the user enters nothing for the "Death Rune" texture, it will just default to TMW's special "Death Presence" texture when the Rune enters a Death state.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #723 | Raw
